CodeGen.SQLStatement: Select cmn_bpt_businessparticipants.DisplayName as hip_name, hec_his_healthinsurance_companies.HealthInsurance_IKNumber as hip_ik_number From hec_his_healthinsurance_companies Inner Join cmn_bpt_businessparticipants On hec_his_healthinsurance_companies.CMN_BPT_BusinessParticipant_RefID = cmn_bpt_businessparticipants.CMN_BPT_BusinessParticipantID And cmn_bpt_businessparticipants.Tenant_RefID = @TenantID And cmn_bpt_businessparticipants.IsDeleted = 0 Inner Join hec_patient_healthinsurances On hec_patient_healthinsurances.HIS_HealthInsurance_Company_RefID = hec_his_healthinsurance_companies.HEC_HealthInsurance_CompanyID And hec_patient_healthinsurances.Patient_RefID = @PatientIDs And hec_patient_healthinsurances.Tenant_RefID = @TenantID And hec_patient_healthinsurances.IsDeleted = 0 Where hec_his_healthinsurance_companies.Tenant_RefID = @TenantID And hec_his_healthinsurance_companies.IsDeleted = 0 Group By hip_name
